title: Humanitarian Office of Center of Charismatic Christian Churches of Ukraine

header.part1: Humanitarian Office of Center of Charismatic

project.remont-title: Our volunteers made repairs in one of the settlements of Uzhhorod. Now people have warm water and the opportunity to take a shower and cook for themselves. thanks for your support.

SeniorBishopTitle:
Pastor of the Living Word Church, Kyiv
Honorific Doctor of Theology

stories.headline: Stories
stories.title: One of the first families we were able to help was the Polyarenko family from Kyiv. The people had a temporary shelter, and later we helped to rent housing, now they have shelter and the opportunity to live and work in a safer city.
